Title: 7 Days in Havana
Director: Laurent Cantet, Benicio Del Toro, Julio Medem, Gaspar Noé, Elia Suleiman, Juan Carlos Tabío, Pablo Trapero
Writer: Laurent Cantet (segment), Alejandro Fadel (segment), Martín Mauregui (segment), Julio Medem (segment), Santiago Mitre (segment), Gaspar Noé (segment), Leonardo Padura (segment), Elia Suleiman (segment), Pablo Trapero (segment)
Actors: Josh Hutcherson, Vladimir Cruz, Magali Wilson, Daisy Granados
Plot: A lesbian, an aspiring actor, an aspiring singer, a low-class marriage, a neighborhood community and 2 renowned directors have memorable less-than-24-hour-long experiences while living in/visiting the capital of Cuba.
